topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: Create a New Project

body.p: The Project is a workspace where the application is built.

ol.li: Click the Projects tab and then click New Project.

Specify the source for this project. To use Docker, you must select the repository where the dockerfile is located.If your repo is internal, make sure you select the Git option or the webhook which triggers the automated build process may not be created properly.
Enter a Project Name.
Select a source:
GitHub: Click to connect to a repository hosted on GitHub that you own or have admin rights to. Select the repository to associate with this project and then click Select.
Git: Connect to a repository hosted locally. Enter the Name of the repo and the Clone URL and click Select.
Click Next.

Define the Pipeline: If you are using Docker, you must select the branch in the repository where the dockerfile is located.
Branch: Select the target environment to deploy to. If the target environment has not yet been created, click Create New Environment.
Project Type: Select the appropriate development language.
Click Next.

Define the Environment.
The HPE Helion Code Engine has detected the dockerfile and offers the option of working with Docker Hub. If you choose to work with Docker Hub, the Code Engine will perform the following procedure when the files are built.
Creates a Docker image that is sent to Docker Hub.
That image is cloned and tested.
If all the tests pass, the test container is discarded and the pristine image version is retrieved from Docker Hub and deployed into the Cloud Foundry target as specified.

Notification.
Select the Type of Notification and then provide the required credentials.
HTTP Post
Notification Target Name: Enter the name of the person to notify.
HTTP Endpoint: Specify an endpoint where HelionCI events should be sent. Very similar to defining a webhook. Examples would be the URL of an internal website, a communication tool, or an RSS feed.
Token: Generate a token as required for the target endpoint. The method will vary depending on the target.
Click Save.

Notification Target Name: Enter the name of the person to notify.
